# merchantIdentifier

**Instance Property**

The Apply Pay merchant identifier.

## Declaration

```swift
required DOMString merchantIdentifier;
```

## Discussion

The merchant identifier you provide when you make an Apple Pay payment request. If you request a payment token for another merchant, use their merchant identifier, if available. Otherwise, use your own merchant identifier.

For more information about merchant identifiers, see [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/ApplePayontheWeb/configuring-your-environment].

## Specifying the merchant

- **merchantName**: The merchant’s display name that the Apple Pay server associates with the payment token.
- **merchantDomain**: The merchant’s top-level domain that the Apple Pay server associates with the payment token.
- **externalIdentifier**: An external identifier for the merchant.
